sentence.Network_en: This war had to be fought fast and relatively bloodlessly.
sentence.Network_cn: 这场战争必须速战速决，尽量兵不血刃。

sentence.Network_en: The coup disposed of the dictator bloodlessly.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这次政变中,没有流血,独裁者就被赶下了台.

entry.tran: （政变或胜利）不流血的，无伤亡的
entry.def: A bloodless coup or victory is one in which nobody is killed.

example.ex: Reports from the area indicate that it was a bloodless coup...
example.tran: 发自该地区的报道表明这是一次不流血的政变。

example.ex: The campaign would be short and relatively bloodless.
example.tran: 这场战役应该是速战速决，基本没什么伤亡。

entry.tran: （人的面容或肤色）苍白的，无血色的
entry.def: If you describe someone's face or skin as bloodless, you mean that it is very pale.

example.tran: 她的脸色苍白，没有血色

means.word_mean: 1. in a bloodless manner; without shedding blood;

sentences.sentence: "the coup disposed of the dictator bloodlessly"

auth_sentence.content: Butch and the Sundance Kid prospered and did so bloodlessly; not until the very end, when cornered, did they shoot anyone.
auth_sentence.res_content: Butch and the Sundance Kid prospered and did so bloodlessly; not until the very end, when cornered, did they shoot anyone.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Butch and the Sundance Kid prospered and did so bloodlessly; not until the very end, when cornered, did they shoot anyone.

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
